timeline.message: Suppress warning for using expected exception in test.

timeline.bodyText: Without this annotation I don't see any lint warnings. Any special flags I need to use?
timeline.author: sanjaypujare

replies.bodyText: In google3, there is (see cl/313881311). Basically, it's the thing we discussed, ExpectedException is deprecated in Junit 4.13 and google3 suggests you using assertThrow. So we currently suppress those warnings.
replies.author: voidzcy
